Articles.Content:
I am alone, that hear about 00:30s time of trailer of this game, a VAB game music from KSP?

or it is any open license which allows to use anywhere and btw in Kerbal?

http://store.steampowered.com/app/364660/
It is a free song with many others inside KSP, not 100% sure but i think the creator is Kevin MacLeod

I think all KSP music is Kevin McCleod music.

It's free to use so it is quite popular for games.

- - - Updated - - -

It is a free song with many others inside KSP, not 100% sure but i think the creator is Kevin MacLeod

Beat me to it.

Hey, I've just released that game on Steam

(yes, I am the author)

Hey, I've just released that game on Steam

(yes, I am the author)

Yeah, nice usage that calm music, but sorry, while playing i am still loking for rocket parts on the left side :-)

That looks like a great game, Blizzy! I remember playing a very old game just like this one, called Prisma. Wish you success.

(and sorry for the off-topic.)
This question gets asked a lot. As others have explained, KSP got much of its music from an outside source. Other places use this music as well. Nothing illegal is going on.
